dialogue_turns.speaker: Microfilm
dialogue_turns.text: I mean, that's what people used to think digital records were all about, but Kazakhstan is showing it's so much more than that.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: I mean, that's what people used to think digital records were all about, but Kazakhstan is showing it's so much more than that.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Absolutely, and Mikheil Lomtadze from Kaspi.kz just highlighted how they've completely digitized vehicle ownership registration—over 7 million citizens use their Super App for government services now.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Absolutely, and Mikheil Lomtadze from the website just highlighted how they've completely digitized vehicle ownership registration-over seven million citizens use their Super App for government services now.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Over 7 million Kazakhstan citizens, our valued customers, visit the Government services section in the Kaspi.kz Super App. We have completely digitized the procedure to change vehicle ownership.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: That's a huge number, and it? And he mentioned that every third vehicle in the country is registered fully online through the app, which is just mind-blowing.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: That's a huge number, and it? And he mentioned that every third vehicle in the country is registered fully online through the app, which is just mind-blowing.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: At this moment, every third vehicle in the country is registered fully online using the Kaspi.kz Super App, said Mikheil.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, and it's not just vehicles—they're also moving child social security benefits online with the Ministry of Labour. Parents don't have to visit service centers anymore.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, and it's not just vehicles-they're also moving child social security benefits online with the Ministry of Labour. Parents don't have to visit service centers anymore.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Mikheil Lomtadze also commented that the application for child social security benefits is also moving online. Parents no longer need to visit the Public Service Centre and present paper documents.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Which is such a time-saver for families, right? And the app even gives personalized recommendations for early childhood development, which is a nice touch.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Which is such a time-saver for families, right? And the app even gives personalized recommendations for early childhood development, which is a nice touch.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: It really shows how digitalization isn't just about convenience; it's about improving quality of life directly. And they're working with so many ministries—Finance, Interior, Digital Development…
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It really shows how digitalization isn't just about convenience; it's about improving quality of life directly. And they're working with so many ministries-Finance, Interior, Digital Development...
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: We have joint projects with the Ministry of Digital Development, Ministry of Finance, State Revenue Committee, Ministry of Labour, Ministry of the Interior and National Information Technologies JSC.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Plus international organizations too, for global integration. And President Tokayev himself acknowledged their success at the Kazakhstan Growth Forum, where Kaspi.kz won three awards.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Plus international organizations too, for global integration. And President Tokayev himself acknowledged their success at the Kazakhstan Growth Forum, where the website won three awards.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Mikhail Lomtadze and Kaspi.kz receives three awards at Kazakhstan Growth Forum Yesterday the Kazakhstan Growth Forum held its annual ceremony, recognizing... I think that we all need to accept your history of success both in Kazakhstan and increasingly abroad. I wish you further success!, - said President Kassym-Zhomart Tokayev in response.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: It's pretty cool to see a fintech company from Kazakhstan making such a global impact. Like, you don't always expect that level of innovation from emerging markets, but they're leading the way.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It's pretty cool to see a fintech company from Kazakhstan making such a global impact. Like, you don't always expect that level of innovation from emerging markets, but they're leading the way.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: For sure. And Lomtadze emphasized that the main goal is making people's lives better right here, right now—not some distant future promise.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: For sure. And Lomtadze emphasized that the main goal is making people's lives better right here, right now-not some distant future promise.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The main goal of digital transformation is to make peoples lives better. The services we have launched make peoples lives better right here, right now.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Exactly. It's practical, immediate change. And with the state infrastructure project he mentioned, even more is coming.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Exactly. It's practical, immediate change. And with the state infrastructure project he mentioned, even more is coming.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: According to Mikheil, the implementation of the state infrastructure project will allow even greater success in digitalization.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: I love that it's a public-private partnership model too. Governments and tech companies collaborating can really accelerate progress.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: I love that it's a public-private partnership model too. Governments and tech companies collaborating can really accelerate progress.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Totally. It's a blueprint other countries might wanna look at, honestly.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Totally. It's a blueprint other countries might wanna look at, honestly.
